text: Does anyone know how I can disable some css when HubSpot generates the image preview of a template? Is there any class that is set before the screenshot is taken?
Does anyone have any idea what the issue here is? Simple dnd_area with a single dnd_module, but getting 6 warnings of `Content could not be found`.
is the the base.html correct “./layouts/base.html” or is it back up one dir
I believe they're correct paths. It's used on other templates and has no issues.
